pageOptions.headline: Privacy Policy
pageOptions.subHeading: We will not, without your permission, sell, publish or share information you entrust to us that identifies you or any person.

collected.why: To keep track who changed what
moreInfo: Username, e-mail address. Only when you edit together with others

notCollected.why: I don't care were you are dancing
moreInfo: Or do I ? - Maybe there could be a new feature in the future to exchange infos about events.

shared.why: To keep track who changed what
moreInfo: The data is only shared with the persons you are working with.

shared.why: To save and share with others.
moreInfo: Google spreadsheets are used to save the data the user adds in the app. In that way the data can be accessed across plattforms and shared with others. Without having a central place to store the data. You can watch an introduction video here: https://youtu.be/QeunpMUseZ8

notShared.why: We do not share your personal information with them.
moreInfo: Social networks are companies that connect individuals around common interests and facilitate sharing.

notShared.why: I got not nothing to do with that.
moreInfo: Only configured Google Tables are read/changed.
